content: @Jose Costa Teixeira the status bar that comes out of the IG publisher does not have a "Workgroup" like HL7 has. Is this something I didn't configure, or is this something that just doesn't exist in the IHE template?
Or do you mean the metainfo header that @Lloyd McKenzie was going to merge into the template?

and what is the workgroup? in the HL7 IGs i see only one contact, e.g. HL7 FHIR Infrastructure group (which would be the same thing as replacing "Integrating the Healthcare Enterprise (IHE)" with "Integrating the Healthcare Enterprise (IHE) - ITI Committee"
in HL7 IGs, there is the HL7 Workgroup that owns the IG.. In IHE we have "domains" (Pharmacy, PCC, QRPH, ITI, Rad, etc...)
I see that most of the time the status bar in HL7 is a combination of "HL7" and the workgroup.
in the footer is a link to the workgroup

I lost track of what is being discussed here, but I presume this is an ex-discussion.
HL7 has the same template as IHE, in the footer they just put the contact as the working group, not HL7 international.
The logos on the top can be added as per the parallel discussion
Yes, I figured that out. and ITI has been doing that for some time.
